channel.title: CVE Feed for Hgiga -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hgiga -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-22851|2024-09-16T17:43:24.218Z -- hgiga -- oaksv20%20oaklouds-document_v3%202.0
item.description: HGiga EIP product contains SQL Injection vulnerability. Attackers can inject SQL commands into specific URL parameter (document management page) to obtain database schema and data.

item.title: CVE-2021-22852|2024-09-16T16:33:42.943Z -- hgiga -- oaksv20%20oaklouds-mol_course_v3%202.0
item.description: HGiga EIP product contains SQL Injection vulnerability. Attackers can inject SQL commands into specific URL parameter (online registration) to obtain database schema and data.

item.title: CVE-2020-35742|2024-09-16T18:03:00.267Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains a vulnerability of SQL Injection. Attackers can inject and launch SQL commands in a URL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2022-38118|2024-09-16T17:29:10.368Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: OAKlouds Portal websiteâ€™s Meeting Room has insufficient validation for user input. A remote attacker with general user privilege can perform SQL-injection to access, modify, delete database, perform system operations and disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2021-37913|2024-09-16T17:18:49.201Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds%20oaksv2
item.description: The HGiga OAKlouds mobile portal does not filter special characters of the IPv6 Gateway parameter of the network interface card setting page. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to perform command injection and execute arbitrary commands in the system without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2024-4298|2024-08-01T20:33:53.107Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The email search interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4296|2024-08-01T20:33:53.173Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The account management interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-4297|2024-08-01T20:33:53.076Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.
